overview: In one of the public sector companies, and during the period of the board of directors elections, (Hassan) the simple worker nominates himself in the elections, and his colleagues support him because of their confidence in him and out of spite against the chairman of the board who is mired in corruption and distraction.  (Hassan) has a love affair with one of his female colleagues in the company.  The head of the company drives his playful girlfriend to seduce (Hassan) and discredit him in front of his colleagues so that he loses the elections.  Conflict flares up in the company over the open.
title: اللعب على المكشوف
